name: 施青良
objective: This course is designed to develop students' communicative competence in a real, everyday setting and to familiarise students with integrative language learning strategies.
schedule:
Week 1-2    Unit 9
Week 3-4    Unit 10
Week 5-6    Unit 11
Week 7-8    Unit 12
Week 9      Exam
Week 10-11  Unit 13
Week 12-13  Unit 14
Week 14-15  Unit 15
Week 16-17  Unit 16
Week 18     Exam
scorePolicy: Evaluation will be based on two exams (50%), in-class activity (35%) and attendance (15%).
